name: The Clock Maze
description:
The Clock Maze - it's a game, where you need to find a detail for your friend's machine, because the friend wants to get bigger to live in 'our world' and no longer live in the clock. 

Assets I used: 

https://commandeq-haltef4.itch.io/japanese-style-tilesets

https://wintonson.itch.io/gb-studio-sprites

https://reakain.itch.io/gb-studio-7-11-tileset

https://wanderavg.itch.io/free-gameboy-platformer-tilesets

https://petermilko.itch.io/pixel-petes-art-assets
